chunks.text: This was a multi-agency fire investigation day.
This test was to evaluate the ignition of a vehicle tire and growth time to support practical scene investigation techniques.
It took sustained combustion for over five minutes to achieve full self-ignition of the tire.
Temperature and prior use of the tyre is a major factor it seems that you should consider.
The fire took over five minutes to engage the body and a further five minutes until we
put it out using a foam extinguisher which was extremely effective.
We identified burn patterns and indicators using markers on the vehicle engine bay
as well as on the body and helps us determine origin and cause.

text: This was a multi-agency fire investigation day. This test was to evaluate the ignition of a vehicle tire and growth time to support practical scene investigation techniques. It took sustained combustion for over five minutes to achieve full self-ignition of the tire. Temperature and prior use of the tyre is a major factor it seems that you should consider. The fire took over five minutes to engage the body and a further five minutes until we put it out using a foam extinguisher which was extremely effective. We identified burn patterns and indicators using markers on the vehicle engine bay as well as on the body and helps us determine origin and cause.
